author: not
msg: ARIES-474 Force us to use 2.0.8 up to, but not including 2.1.0 of twitter4j. It appears 2.1.0 is not backward compatible with 2.0.8, whoever created the API doesn't know about semantic versioning. This probably became an issue because 2.1.0 was uploaded to the external repository the test uses.

author: trawick
msg: follow up r1028551 with an additional fix in support
of modules which create server_rec dynamically
in this case, server_rec was used in the fcgid daemon
to obtain the vhost config for a process being started
and for logging the ServerName setting for a process

author: norman
msg: Ignore case on sender verification (PROTOCOLS-6 and JAMES-837)

author: chope
msg: Add fix to allow overriding of the Timestamp class to create an immutable class, by removing a call to a public method in the Timestamp constructor.  Regression testcase included.
